overview:
Stephen Hobson is a 16 year old guy living in central Virginia. Stephen has been interested in technology since the age of five and has been using a computer since the age of nine. After several years of using a Windows based computer, he grew to become a strong supporter of Windows and is currently using Windows 7 on his primary computer.

Due to the rapidly increasing quantities of public profiles being created online, Stephen became more interested and researched methods for creating a website. Stephen’s first website was created when he was just eleven. As time went on, Stephen’s skills with basic languages such as HTML, became more sophisticated. He utilized this knowledge and finally created TheRivahratt.com. This website was, and still is, Stephen’s personal blog where he has been posting quality content since 2008. With over 200 entries, there is an overwhelming amount of software reviews, hardware reviews, general opinions, and the occasional complaints.

Shortly after the creation of Stephen’s website, he created his first YouTube channel known as Rivahratt95 and began making videos for a very small audience for the first few months. After a few years, Stephen’s popularity on YouTube increased and he became a YouTube Partner. Today, he has over 1,000 subscribers, over 100 videos, and remains motivated to bring his audience the best videos he can.

His username, Rivahratt, originated from a summer home he would typically visit. When creating his first profile, this was the username he picked and it has stuck with him ever since. If you are interested in contacting Stephen, you may send an E-mail to Stephen@TheRivahratt.com.

milestones.description: Stephen's YouTube channel now has a partnership.
Stephen's YouTube channel has reached 1,000 subscribers.
